name: The Night Before My Wedding
description:
It's the night before both of your wedding and you were nervous, so you and your fiancé had a talk...

A quick kinetic visual novel I made for the O2A2 Game Jam - Queer Edition ! It's a 1K visual novel where you and your fiancé spent time together  ♡

-------

If you want to tip me, go to my Kofi !

Music by Dova Syndrome

Background by Pixabay

Quick Menu GUI assets by Lily ♡
